insight_template: Type 2 Diabetes affects ~{prevalence}% of adults worldwide. Those with BMI above {threshold} and low physical activity show significantly higher risk of insulin resistance. Managing lifestyle factors like sugar intake and daily movement is key to prevention.

Cardiovascular Disease contributes to ~{prevalence}% of global mortality. Chronic stress, poor sleep, and sedentary habits significantly increase risk across all age groups. Regular movement and stress management are protective factors.

Hypertension affects ~{prevalence}% of the global adult population. Stress management, increased physical activity, and adequate sleep are among the most effective lifestyle interventions for blood pressure control.

Obesity affects ~{prevalence}% of adults globally and increases risk for multiple chronic conditions. Increasing daily physical activity and reducing caloric intake are foundational prevention strategies.

Sleep disorders affect ~{prevalence}% of the global population. Poor sleep is linked to metabolic dysfunction, increased cardiovascular risk, and cognitive decline. Sleep hygiene and stress reduction are key interventions.
